blog.name: narry2k19
blog.title: l i l i
blog.description:
// I love narry more than I love myself //

// 19 // marvel, one direction, taylor swift, shawn mendes, ariana grande stan //

summary: I'm not going anywhere from now. (Narry)
body:
I’m not going anywhere from now. (Narry)

Hi guys,

It’s my first narry one shot I have ever written in english. It’s not my first language but I hope, that you will enjoy it. Thank you for reading it loves. Xx

____________________________________

“ Harry could arrive in any moment. ” Niall thought, while he was sitting on his couch, biting his nails nervously. He knew that it was a very bad habit, but he couldn’t help it, he was excited and jittery at the same time.

He missed Harry.

He missed his boyfriend’s warm hugs, his sweet kisses, and his awful jokes as well. He never found his jokes funny, but he laughed at them just to see his boyfriend’s beautiful smile.

It has been years, but he was still in love with Harry. They had a few up and downs, but at the end of the day, they always found the way to each other again. Niall and Harry were like two puzzle pieces, they feel complete when they are together, connected.

Niall was walking up and down in the stairs. He cleaned the whole house, watched golf to distract his thoughts. It worked for the first few hours, but five o'clock seemed to impossible to come faster. It’s when Harry’s plane will land.

However the older boy wanted to go to the airport to welcome his boyfriend, he couldn’t. The two men thought that their relationship only belongs to them, their family and closest friends. When the time will come to tell the world who they really are, everybody will realize that these two were together since the very beginning.

Although in the past months, they started to give signs, and the people who had some clue about them, started to catch up.

It was five minutes past seven, and Niall started to get more nervous. He had some bad thoughs running inside his head.

What if fans attacked him at the airport? No, it couldn’t be, Harry can take care of himself.

“ But what if, if something really happened to him?”

“ What if he had some trouble during his way to the airport? What if his flight got delayed? What if he wasn’t on the plane? What if he missed his flight? What if he doesn’t want to see me? What if he doesn’t lo..”

Niall’s hands started to shaking, his heart started to hurt at his last thoughts.

“ No, Harry loves me, he couldn’t do that to me. He is just late..yeah, that’s the only acceptable option.”

“ Oh for fuck sake. ” Niall buried his hands into his hands. He was near to cry in front of his friends.

He missed his boyfriend. He didn’t see him for a month, because he had some case in Tokyo for his upcoming album. He was proud of him, but him being not in his arms, safely, hurted Niall. Harry’s absence made Niall absolutely crazy.

“ Niall, calm down mate, we don’t want you to have a panic attack in the middle of your living room. ” His friends looked at him with worried eyes, because they knew how much the Irish boy loved the younger boy.

Niall didn’t say a word just walked back and forth in the living room. His friends knew that it’s better to not say anything to Niall in this condition, because he will snap.

“ Connor is right man. Come, sit down on the couch, and take some deep breaths. ” Shawn said, pointing to the free spot next to him.

“ Guys, I am fine. I’m just.. ” Niall started to speak, but he couldn’t find the right words to continue his talk, so he listened to his friends and sat down on the comfortable couch, and embraced his legs with his arms, and put his head on his knees.

Niall closed his eyes for a moment, and the bad thoughts filled his mind again. Salty tears started to form in his eyes, and as much as he didn’t want to cry, he let them stream down on his face.

He didn’t know how much time had passed by, but he heard his friends calling his name.

“ Niall, man.. ” they said quietly.

“ What is it guys? ” He wiped off the tears from his face.

“ Your boy is.. ” His friends started to speak, but a heavy bag was heard to put down in the hallway.

Niall turned his head to the the noise, and when he saw his boyfriend with a bunch of roses in his hand, the Irish boy got up quickly from the couch, and ran to his boyfriend arms immediately, almost slipping on the carpet.

Niall didn’t care about his friends saying slow down mate shouts, Niall just wanted to hold his boyfriend forever in his arms.

Like a kid, Niall jumped on Harry, which made the roses fall out from his hand. He buried his head into younger boy’s chest. His legs were around Harry’s waist, and he was holding his boyfriend’s t-shirt so tightly didn’t care that it will rip apart.

(But after his friends will be gone, one way or another it will end on the floor like their other clothes, but that’s an an another story to tell)

“ Please tell me that you are real, and it’s not my imagination playing with me. ” Niall whispered, and he looked up at the curly haired boy with tears forming in his eyes again.

“ I’m very much real darling. ” Harry wiped off the tears from Niall’s eyes. “ I’m here now. ” He placed a soft kiss on the Irish boy’s lips, while he put his hands on his face.

Minutes passed by, and some throat clearing was heard in the living room. The two boy pulled apart, completely forgetting that there were other people a few meters away from them.

Niall showed a middle finger into their direction, while Harry placed an another kiss on the older boy’s neck.

“ I missed you. ” Harry whispered to Niall, who just bit his lips and smiled.

“ I missed you more. ” He replied truthfully.

“ He was about to go crazy. ” Connor laughed in the back.

“ I did not. ” Niall muttered, and a blush appeared on his face.

“ Whatever you say mate. ” His friends said, smiling into their direction. “ At least you are here now Harry. That’s all matters. ”

“ Yeah. ” Harry said, pressing his lips to Niall’s cheek. “I’m not going anywhere from now. ”

Niall was walking up and down in the stairs. He cleaned the whole house, watched golf to distract his thoughts. It worked for the first few hours, but five o'clock seemed to impossible to come faster. It’s when Harry’s plane will land.

Niall’s hands started to shaking, his heart started to hurt at his last thoughts.

“ No, Harry loves me, he couldn’t do that to me. He is just late..yeah, that’s the only acceptable option.”

“ Oh for fuck sake. ” Niall buried his hands into his hands. He was near to cry in front of his friends.

He missed his boyfriend. He didn’t see him for a month, because he had some case in Tokyo for his upcoming album. He was proud of him, but him being not in his arms, safely, hurted Niall. Harry’s absence made Niall absolutely crazy.

“ Niall, calm down mate, we don’t want you to have a panic attack in the middle of your living room. ” His friends looked at him with worried eyes, because they knew how much the Irish boy loved the younger boy.

Niall didn’t say a word just walked back and forth in the living room. His friends knew that it’s better to not say anything to Niall in this condition, because he will snap.

“ Connor is right man. Come, sit down on the couch, and take some deep breaths. ” Shawn said, pointing to the free spot next to him.

“ Guys, I am fine. I’m just.. ” Niall started to speak, but he couldn’t find the right words to continue his talk, so he listened to his friends and sat down on the comfortable couch, and embraced his legs with his arms, and put his head on his knees.

Niall closed his eyes for a moment, and the bad thoughts filled his mind again. Salty tears started to form in his eyes, and as much as he didn’t want to cry, he let them stream down on his face.

He didn’t know how much time had passed by, but he heard his friends calling his name.

“ Niall, man.. ” they said quietly.

“ What is it guys? ” He wiped off the tears from his face.

“ Your boy is.. ” His friends started to speak, but a heavy bag was heard to put down in the hallway.

Niall turned his head to the the noise, and when he saw his boyfriend with a bunch of roses in his hand, the Irish boy got up quickly from the couch, and ran to his boyfriend arms immediately, almost slipping on the carpet.

Niall didn’t care about his friends saying slow down mate shouts, Niall just wanted to hold his boyfriend forever in his arms.

Like a kid, Niall jumped on Harry, which made the roses fall out from his hand. He buried his head into younger boy’s chest. His legs were around Harry’s waist, and he was holding his boyfriend’s t-shirt so tightly didn’t care that it will rip apart.

(But after his friends will be gone, one way or another it will end on the floor like their other clothes, but that’s an an another story to tell)

“ Please tell me that you are real, and it’s not my imagination playing with me. ” Niall whispered, and he looked up at the curly haired boy with tears forming in his eyes again.

“ I’m very much real darling. ” Harry wiped off the tears from Niall’s eyes. “ I’m here now. ” He placed a soft kiss on the Irish boy’s lips, while he put his hands on his face.

Minutes passed by, and some throat clearing was heard in the living room. The two boy pulled apart, completely forgetting that there were other people a few meters away from them.

Niall showed a middle finger into their direction, while Harry placed an another kiss on the older boy’s neck.

“ I missed you. ” Harry whispered to Niall, who just bit his lips and smiled.

“ I missed you more. ” He replied truthfully.

“ He was about to go crazy. ” Connor laughed in the back.

“ I did not. ” Niall muttered, and a blush appeared on his face.

“ Whatever you say mate. ” His friends said, smiling into their direction. “ At least you are here now Harry. That’s all matters. ”

“ Yeah. ” Harry said, pressing his lips to Niall’s cheek. “I’m not going anywhere from now. ”

Forever proud💚

summary: The fact that Zayn and Harry got 162728828 matching tattoos together and had the audacity to act like they never even spoke like...
body:
The fact that Zayn and Harry got 162728828 matching tattoos together and had the audacity to act like they never even spoke like they don’t care gets on each and every one of my nerves I will literally fucking explode is this a fucking joke?

Alexa, Siri, Cortana play ‘my heart isn’t a fucking joke you douchebags babies please get bag together it fucking hurts y'all fucking love each other’

Yes that’s a fucking song.

blog.name: mr-mr-ontheradio
blog.title: Harry Styles. Louis Tomlinson. One Direction.
blog.description:
Katelyn. Directioner. Harrie/Louie/Larrie 💚💙 Ask is open so please share your thoughts or ask me something :)

my face

summary:
Zayn literally does the sign for "stop it" when louis starts to drool over naked harry. 
I'm in my 2nd year of ASL at school and...
body:
Zayn literally does the sign for “stop it” when louis starts to drool over naked harry.

I’m in my 2nd year of ASL at school and I picked it up without even looking for it that’s how distinct the sign is.

actual signing is a lot looser than the instructional videos obviously but there’s no fucking doubt that he’s doing it. he even looks down at his hands first.

in conclusion this video is even louder than we thought which is saying something bc louis’ face automatically gives everything away.

summary: Creatures Of The Night // Wolf Harry Teaser
title: Creatures Of The Night // Wolf Harry Teaser
body:
HI!!

So here is the tiny preview of what is to come for mine and @thedevilinbetweenthesheets collaboration!! I hope you enjoy <3

#WolfHarry or #VampireHarry

–

“So they confronted the wolves, and a deal was made, a treaty line was drawn, as long as the wolves didn’t cross the line, the vampires wouldn’t feed on the towns innocents anymore, as, for the wolves, their rule was that as long as the vampires didn’t cross the line, the wolves wouldn’t make them their breakfast.” She smiles,

“So now until this day the treaty holds and has yet to be broken” She ends, looking to you with a smile,

“What will break the treaty?” Your question,

“Who knows my dear, a war can start over many things, it may never break, it may hold for a few more centuries, only time will tell” She coo’s standing to switch off the bedside lamp,

“And are they really out there Grandma?” You question, sitting up to stare from the small window beside your bed,

“They are” She smiles, letting the room go black

–

summary: valentines day for young harry and bambi(blurb)
question: valentines day for young harry and bambi(blurb)
answer:
Jealous young Harry as well. Two requests in one haha. Thank you for sending me those requests for the My Girl Series, I’m saving them for later, they’re all so cute!

.

Harry was just about to drift off when the loud voice at the entrance got his eyes to shoot open. Nine-year-old Y/N dashed into the treehouse, holding a red box as she flopped down on the floor by his side. The boy quickly propped himself up on his elbows, raising an eyebrow when his little neighbor told him she’d brought chocolate for them both.

“Ta-da!” She giggled, opening up the box with a massive beam on her face.

“Why did your mum get you such a big box?” Harry asked as he sat up straight.

“Not my mum, a boy gave it to me.”

Her answer made him snort.

“A boy? Ew, since when have you got a boyfriend?”

“I haven’t.” Y/N grumbled as she punched the older boy’s shoulder. “This boy in my class gave me chocolate because tomorrow is Valentine’s Day.”

Valentine’s Day? Now that Harry remembered, last week his sister’s boyfriend came over and asked him about the stuff that Gemma loved so he could get her something on Valentine’s Day. Harry normally didn’t care about these special occasions, but now all of a sudden, he was beginning to.

“He even gave me a heart-shaped note,” Y/N said with a huge smile on her face that got Harry shifting in discomfort. “Wanna see it? I have it he—“

Without waiting for the girl to hand it over, he snatched the note from her hand and tried to read the sloppy handwriting of a fourth grader.

Rolling his eyes, Harry said, “I can spot a ton of misspellings and grammar mistakes here. You are my shunshine? What the hell is shunshine?”

“Don’t curse, H!”

Her grimace got him chuckling.

“It’s fine,” he assured her. “Gemma does it all the time.”

“So can I say ‘what the hell?’ now?”

“No! Bambi, you’re a kid don’t say things like that. I’m 13 already, basically a teenager.” His answer made the girl pout. She hated how he always had to bring up the fact that she was four years younger than him just to call her a kid. But Harry didn’t seem to care if he got her upset, he handed her back the card and said, “you shouldn’t be having a boyfriend either.”

“But he’s not my boyfriend.” The girl huffed, shooting her older friend a glare. “Are you gonna eat this?”

“Nope.” Harry crossed his arms and turned away, sticking his nose up.

“Fine. More for me then!”

Just like that, she took her chocolate box and ran away.

.

.

.

It was finally Valentine’s Day, and Harry found himself ringing on Y/N’s doorbell and asking her mum to call her for him.

When his Bambi showed up at the door, he quickly handed her the red card he was hiding behind his back, smiling for how confused she looked.

“Wrote you a card with correct spellings and grammar.” He chuckled when she lifted an eyebrow.

“To little Bambi,” she read the words aloud. “Happy Valentine’s Day. From Harry.” Then she flipped the card over, expecting more but those were the only few lines she could find. Laughing, she looked at him. “That’s it?”

“Simple and meaningful,” he said, laughing along and pulling out from his pocket something else. Without waiting for her to ask, he took her wrist and put the seashell bracelet on for her.

“Oh my god! Cool!” Y/N bounced up and down as her eyes sparked with joy. “Did you buy this?”

“Gemma did, b-but it’s my money…” He said, scratching the back of his head, making her smile.

Without a warning, Y/N wrapped her arms around his waist, pulling her older friend into a hug and repeatedly thanking him for the gift as well as the card. Harry held the girl’s shoulders to push her away before she suffocated him, telling her goodbye since he must now get home to do his chores.

“Wait, I also have something for you!” She said, biting her lip in excitement. “Close your eyes.”

Harry immediately took a step back, eyes squinted in doubt. “What are you gonna do? Are you gonna give me those bugs again?”

“No, I’m saving them for Halloween.” She giggled when a look of horror flashed on his face.

Taking a deep breath, Harry finally closed his eyes.

“Okay…” He said. “Go on.”

“Here!”

The boy’s green eyes shot open and the corners of his mouth curved into a smile when he saw her holding up a pack of Hershey Kisses.

“Accept my sweet kisses,” she said as both of them broke into a fit of laughter.

The boy thanked his little friend for the chocolate and hurriedly ran back home before his mother found out he hadn’t cleaned his room yet. Watching him go, Y/N kept smiling from ear to ear. Now the girl couldn’t wait until they were older so she could finally give him real kisses on Valentine’s Day.

“Here!”

summary: I got it made, gonna top the charts Be the Hollywood sign be a big star Legacy, on the boulevard Take another picture, give a...
caption:
I got it made, gonna top the charts
Be the Hollywood sign be a big star
Legacy, on the boulevard
Take another picture, give a little more
No stress just gotta make myself
Be a best seller waiting on a shelf
I say it’ll be worth it when I can do it my way every day

HOME - MESSAGE - FAQ - TAKEN LIST - WANTED - NAVIGATION

Star Studded used to be a plotless celebrity roleplay, now however we are back with a twist. Instead of being a regular secret group we decided to spice it up a little, give our members a chance to choose how much they want their plot to be seen. Each member get to choose by four different options when joining. Past secret, future secret, normal secret or no secret. This gives the members a chance to choose how far they will go with their plot as well the choice with how dramatic they want it to be and of course for fun.

summary:
“When you move
I could never define all that you are to me”
AU: When the English National Ballet’s decides to put on a...
body:
“When you move
I could never define all that you are to me”

AU: When the English National Ballet’s decides to put on a production for Swan Lake, prima ballerina Louis Tomlinson is their first choice. But Louis has competition: a new dancer, Harry Styles, who seems very keen on stealing her role.

summary:
harry styles: h-
me: listen to me. listen. I would die for you. I admire and appreciate you so much I’m in tears already. you’ve...
body:
harry styles: h-

me: listen to me. listen. I would die for you. I admire and appreciate you so much I’m in tears already. you’ve got such a big and kind heart and you deserve the kindness and the love you put in the world and so much more because you are the sweetest creature the universe ever saw and your art is so wonderful and touching and you make so many feel so accepted and loved and just. thank you.
